Translations.Text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao puok del brachheang
khnhom min korp sakkar champoh avei del puok anak korp sakkar noh laey
haey puok anak ka minmen chea anak korp sakkar champoh avei del khnhom korp sakkar noh der
haey khnhom minmen chea anak del korp sakkar champoh avei del puok anak ban korp sakkar noh laey
haey puok anak ka minmen chea anak korp sakkar champoh avei del khnhom korp sakkar noh der
samreab puok anak ku sasanea robsa puok anak haey samreab khnhom ku sasanea robsakhnhom
nowpel del chomnuoy robsa a l laoh ning chychomneah ban mk dl( kar romdaoh tikrong mea kkah)
pelnoh anak nung kheunh mnoussaamna chaul sasanea robsa a l laoh teang krom
dau che neah chaur anak leukatamkeung daoy kar sarsaer tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak ning som aphytosa pi trong . pitabrakd nasa trong kuchea anak del ttuol yk kar som aphytosa bamphot
dai teangpir( tongveu) robsa a pou la hab ban vineasa a nd reay haey ke ka vineasa a nd reay
tropy sa mb tde robsa ke ning avei delke ban sang kanlongomk minban phdal phalobrayoch dl ke laey
ke nung chaul tow knong nork del mean andataphleung da santho santhow
haey phriyea robsa ke del chea anak yk banlea( reay leu phlauv daembi thveubeab mou ham meat) ka dauchnaoh der
now nung k robsa neang mean khsae chr vea k phleung
